animeDescription: Second season of Hataraku Onii-san!.  Calico Tapio Chatorazawa has more energy than anyone, and Russian Blue Kuehiko Roshihara is a bit of a sourpuss. These two classmates will do all kinds of different jobs to learn how fun and hard it is to work!  (Source: Crunchyroll, edited)
animeCharacters: ['Roshihara, Kuehiko', 'Chatarozawa, Tapio', 'That Animal That Shall Not be Named', 'Gugugaga']
